org.jooby

Interface Registry

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Request, WebSocket
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Jooby, Request.Forwarding

    public interface Registry

    service registry

    Provides access to services registered by modules or application. The registry is powered by Guice.

    Since:
    1.0.0.CR3
    Author:
    edgar

    • Method Summary
